title: Can I purchase Emerald Taric upon re-releasE?
body:
Thaaaank you to everyone who replied,  I have my answer.

{{champion:44}} He's got elf ears now. That's literally all it takes to get my purchase. 

But, it's a legacy skin or something, right? In the live Client you can't purchase it (It was on sale or something and available not long ago when it was just an incomplete recolour) so I'm wondering, will it be available upon re-release, similar to (I think) poppy's skins?

Also hey, shitty mods, why not move my thread to a better location instead of deleting it next time, I'm just asking a question and despite being 30 GD is still locked to me.

replies.body: For a limited time after release, yes!
This makes me really sad. I bought the emerald taric skin during the winter sale in hopes of having an exclusive skin for the reworked taric. Ah well.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lsA3gFAu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-07T20:19:57.100+0000)
>
> For a limited time after release, yes!

why is that, just wondering but why not make them regular skins again, since obviously the quality is back up to a modern standard?

After all reworks, every skin (that's been in the store) is made available for a short time on that champion.

>Also hey, shitty mods, why not move my thread to a better location instead of deleting it next time, I'm just asking a question and despite being 30 GD is still locked to me.

They've said they delete them instead of moving them so that people can learn where the threads go rather then doing it for you.

They might release a Taric bundle with all his skins upon re-release, like they did with Popsy and Shen.

Bet it's gonna be called the Outrageous bundle.
Thaaaank you to everyone who replied,  I have my answer.
I had heard that Emerald was going to be removed from the vault.
